1080p BD batch of Uchouten Kazoku, brought to you by Vivid.

As there was an unacceptable lack of BD options available for the best show of 2013, we've done our own BD batch. If you haven't checked the show out yet, here's your opportunity! It's well worth it.

This is a 1080p BD release encoded in 10bit h264 with AAC audio. If you have any problems with playback or subtitle rendering, please make sure you're using the latest version of the CCCP.

BD Credits:
Encoding: Daiz
Shifting, QC: Xythar
Additional typesetting: unanimated

Original Credits:
Translation: CR (1, 4-8, 10-11, 13), valerauko (2-3, 9, 12)
TLC: Futsuu
Editing: Xythar
Timing: Konbu, unanimated (1, 5, 7, 12)
Typesetting: unanimated
Song translation: fnord
Song styling: unanimated (OP), Devana (ED)
Encoding: Daiz
QC: Devana

Thanks for choosing Vivid!
